name: StoneDrill Service Install
description: This method detects a service install of the malicious Microsoft Network Realtime Inspection Service service described in StoneDrill report by Kaspersky
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:/[Nn][Tt][Ss][Ss][Rr][Vv]/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*\ [Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:NtsSrv AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\ LocalService)`
